definition: of or involving muscular contraction in which tension is constant while length changes
details:
adjective
- of or involving muscular contraction in which tension is constant while length changes
- (used of solutions) having the same or equal osmotic pressure
= synonyms: isosmotic
- of two or more muscles
- relating to or characterized by the equal intervals of a musical scale
= example: relating to or characterized by the equal intervals of a musical scale
